• Multiplayer mining simulator using MQTT.js for real-time player interactions and map synchronization
  • Procedurally generated map with 20+ tile types, including ores with escalating value based on depth
  • Resource management mechanics featuring fuel consumption, overheating penalties, cargo limits, and upgradeable tools
    this.map[y][x] = type; // Procedural tile generation
    this.publish('pos', { type: 'move', id, gridX, gridY }); // MQTT movement broadcast

Mega Miner Online is an MQTT-powered multiplayer game where players mine procedurally generated terrain depths to collect increasingly valuable resources while managing fuel and environmental hazards. The game includes real-time chat, dynamic inventory tools with upgradable equipment, and customizable controls alongside persistent local saving mechanisms. Players can collaborate/compete in shared environments while viewing resource locations via minimaps and interacting with built structures.
